DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize innovative test device simulate transvaginal tape support increase performance reproducibility diagnosis urethral hypermobility surgery urinary incontinence . The main objective study compare two prognostic test ability predict success ( failure ) implementation suburethral TVT ( tension-free vaginal tape ) TOT ( trans-obturator tape ) treatment stress urinary incontinence woman . The Q-tip test ( test mention French international recommendation ) compare test new test ( clip strip ) .
DOC.brief_title: Development Evaluation New Diagnostic Test Female Urinary Stress Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary objective include : - Compare prognostic ability clip strip test Bonney maneuver - Compare prognostic ability clip strip test TVT maneuver - Compare maximum intraurethral pressure various test - Compare quality life / surgery - Estimate patient satisfaction one year surgery - Describe intra inter-operator reproducibility various prognostic test . - Estimate optimal threshold Q-tip angle base surgical result compare reference threshold 30 Â° find literature .
DOC.criteria: The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient available 60 week followup Candidate stress urinary incontinence surgery TVT TOT procedure Positive cough valsalve maneuver test The patient participate another study ( except PISQR study ) The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The patient contraindication stress urinary incontinence surgery via TVT TOT procedure . The patient untreated vaginal urniary infection The patient history allergy polyurethane / Watershed XCX11122
